name: Stovetop Sesame Chicken Wings
author: gebah
summary: Craving chicken wings... but don't want to turn on the oven? This is the recipe you've been looking for! Serve with thinly sliced raw carrots for a simple appetizer or light summer meal.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds chicken wings, split and tips removed
directions: Combine brown sugar, honey, sesame oil, and chili oil in a small bowl; set aside
Heat olive oil in a nonstick pan over medium heat
Add chicken and cook, turning occasionally, until lightly browned on all sides, about 5 minutes
Reduce heat to low, add soy sauce, and cook until reduced, about 5 minutes
Add brown sugar mixture to the pan
Continue to cook and flip chicken until no longer pink in the center and juices run clear, about 20 minutes
Continue flipping and cooking for an additional 5 minutes
Remove from the pan and sprinkle with sesame seeds
